'''Hilichurl Spiral Watchtower''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Hilichurl Spiral Watchtower is obtainable from [[Tubby]] for reaching [[Trust Rank]] 7.

First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
